testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the contact with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request containing valid authorization credentials, correct ID, and valid data
testcase.system-out: * The api user sends a POST request to the api "addContact" endpoint to create a new "contact" record and records the "Added Contact Message ID" information..passed * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updateContact" path parameters.....................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "Subject Test Contact" and "Message Test Contact" information to send to the api updateContact endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the "Message" information in the response body is "Successfully Updated."..passed * The api user verifies that the "Updated Contact Message ID" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the "data.subject" is "Subject Test Contact" by sending a GET request to the "api" "contact" endpoint with the "Updated Contact Message ID" returned in the response body..passed
